you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the X
when to report my name is Dave and this
is episode 1453 a.n today's date is
December 20th 2017 and the tot of the
episode is warning we might have been
tricked here's how let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now as
we can see the central banks are getting
very worried because the brexit date is
approaching and we know from the past
the central bankers they don't want
anyone to leave their system they want
everyone in their system so they can
control them and it looks like the
brexit is going forward even though the
central bakers are going to try to do
whatever they possibly can to stop it we
see the EU is out there we see the IMF
is out there now saying that the growth
forecast for the British economy is not
going to be as good as we actually
thought it's gonna be a lot lower then
we originally forecast because if
they're going to leave the eurozone it's
not going to work out for the UK now of
course what they're doing is they're
playing this up to make everyone believe
that without the central banks without
being included without going along with
all their rules there's going to be
problems in the UK and of course they're
doing this on purpose they want this as
a clear message to everyone and they
said during the referendum if the
referendum goes through everything's
going to crash and it actually didn't
and whatever the central banks tell you
it is always the opposite whatever
government tells you it is always the
opposite we see right now the house has
passed the Trump tax plan it was
recalled for technicalities and it looks
like the vote went through and was
passed once again now it moves on to the
Senate and once again as we stated
yesterday in the report there are
certain senators that are going to
benefit from this
there was like a rider that was included
in this and again it was shoved in at
the last minute and many senators are
going to benefit from this and once
again this means that the government
individuals that are working in our
government that's supposed to be working
for the people there
actually working for themselves now we
see existing home sales the data from
that came out new home sales pending
home sales and all of a sudden
everything is surging they expected a
point nine percent jump but now all of a
sudden there was a surge of about 5.6
percent this is the strongest pace of
sales since December of 2006 now we need
to understand something inventories
they're saying are crashing but sales
are increasing forget about the pending
home sales most of those are cancelled
along the way the other thing that we
need to understand is that home prices
in these 20 cities they're surging also
while incomes are going down and
mortgage applications are dropping we
see they've dropped by 4.9 percent this
week something like 4 percent last week
yes there were up 4% but as we can see
mortgage applications they have not gone
anywhere it's almost like a flatline and
normally when you see the housing market
increase you see more and more people
taking out mortgages we're not really
seeing this and we've noticed when we
broke it all down that a lot of these
sales are coming from hedge fund
investment companies foreign investors
from the free money from the Fed and now
we know the foreign investors are
backing away and what's even more
interesting is that during the summer
months the retail the real estate
industry was hurting sales were down
this time of the year is not really that
great for real estate and we're seeing
it surge something doesn't make sense
and remember a lot of these numbers are
coming from the government and they have
the ability to manipulate and to make us
believe that these things are really
happening and all they have to do is
pump in free money tell hedge funds
investment companies you know go ahead
purchase it as much as you can keep the
houses off the market and this is
exactly what they do now what's very
interesting is that the stock market is
continually moving up attending record
levels we've never seen it before like
this before you know in the past where
it's been so high now if you go back to
hitting 14,000 points and people said
the same exact thing if you go back to
the dot-com era people said the same
thing if you go all the way back to 1929
when it hit like 300 or 400 points
people that said the same exact thing
and then the market came down but what's
very interesting about the stock market
it is shrinking at the same time the
market is continually moving up now what
I mean by that is that if we go back in
time to 1975 the US domestic companies
had traded on the US exchanges totaled
around four thousand eight hundred
nineteen forty years later the market is
shrunk to less than four thousand
despite tripling in GDP now if you take
a shorter time span like 20 years which
included the dot-com craze guess what
it's even worse the numbers of publicly
listed companies trading on the US
exchanges has been cut almost in half in
the past 20 years from about 7,300
to 3,700 because firms can't grow
organically that is built more business
from new and existing customers they
give up and pay high prices to acquire
their competitors
thus drastically shrinking the number of
US public companies this seriously
contributes to the massive loss of US
middle-class jobs as of early 2017
according to ernest ernst & young just a
hundred and forty of these publicly
traded companies represented more than
half of the total market value of all
stocks traded in the US another stark
example of the dangerous trend of wealth
concentration in the US and what we're
seeing is that the center will have less
companies I should say the central
bankers are coming in and they're buying
as much as they possibly can to pump the
markets up and there are no earnings for
these companies they're not bringing in
more revenue they're not making more
sales so when we look at this the whole
thing the entire thing is based on one
gigantic illusion just like the economy
and every time we dig deeper and deeper
we see that this whole thing is one
gigantic illusion and this is what the
central bankers do now what's very
interesting in the Washington Post they
had this opinion piece and of course
whenever they come out with these
opinion pieces it's like a little feeler
of what the people are going to think
about this they get it out there and
they you know they drop the breadcrumbs
they'll let everyone know that something
is about to happen in the Washington
Post they're saying that the Fed coin is
going to be bigger than Bitcoin now we
talked about this before now there are
two different camps in cryptocurrency
market where people are saying that this
is a decentralized system that it was
developed to move away from the bankers
and this is a people's currency the
other camp is saying that this is a
trick it was created by the NSA the
government and they're trying to trick
us now I can see both sides to this I
can see the decentralized portion of it
where you have Bitcoin and other
cryptocurrencies and if it is possible
to keep the government to keep the
central bank away from the
cryptocurrency market I can see how this
can work but as we know the central
bankers those who are in power they
don't want this to happen and they're
talking about a Fed coin right now what
does that mean it means that they're
going to create one now the Washington
Post is saying that you know it's not
even created yet so when I look at this
they've already created the Fed coin
it's all ready to go what they need is
they need the governments around the
world to pass laws to say that you can
only use the Fed coin now I have an
interview coming up with Jeff Nielsen
and we discussed this and one of their
ways that they can do this is they can
create a bubble in Bitcoin now I know
we've been saying that bitcoins not a
bubble but listen to what I'm saying
here if the central bank
buys more and more of the cryptocurrency
Bitcoin it's very easy for them to do
this all they have to do is create money
out of thin air and they have two BOTS
they can buy it up just like they do
with the stock market just like they do
with the real estate and everything else
so they create currency out of thin air
they buy cryptocurrency they build it up
where the price goes up and up and up
and up they get people into Bitcoin now
is the whole country into Bitcoin now
it's a very small portion then all of a
sudden they sell now if they have about
70 or 60 or 80 percent of the market
it's going to decimate the market
they'll bring it down they then can make
the case of why bitcoin and all other
krypton cryptocurrencies they're too
volatile they're dangerous and we need a
Fed coin and it just so happens they
have one ready to go all we need is for
governments to pass laws to say let the
central bank's handle the crypto
currency market where everyone has to
use the Fed coin I mean they could do
this very easily they've done it before
they pump up the stock market they dump
it they collect the wealth they do it to
the housing market they do it to
everything they create they are the
masters of creating bubbles where they
build stuff up and then they pull the
rug out from under it and we can see
right now this is something that they
might do now the Federal Reserve is
talking about this the biz is talking
about this and the IMF is talking this
and I thought it was very suspicious
when the IMF came out and they started
to talk about Bitcoin and they said it
was good because this does not fit into
their model having a decentralized
currency type of system where they don't
have control and they can't attach any

have to borrow this currency now I could
see where they were saying that the
cryptocurrency market
is great as long as you go along with us
and we can see that this could be their
trick this could be a ploy to make
everyone feel good and this is what they
do you feel great in the stock market
you feel great in the housing market and
then all of a sudden everything crashes
you feel great in the crypto market
Bitcoin litecoin - and then all of a
sudden boom they start selling they drop
the market and they can make their case
very easily and you want to hear more if
you want to hear more about this listen
to the interview with Jeff Nielsen and I
I'm going to be putting this up later
tonight which is Wednesday December 20th
and you can listen to the entire
interview and we could see right now
that this is a possibility and we need
to be very cautious in what we're doing
and this is why when people say well I'm
going all in on cryptocurrency
I'm not doing anything else this is why
I say you have to be very careful yes I
do own crypto currencies yes I have
Bitcoin yes I have
litecoin - and all others but I don't
have everything in there I still buy
gold and silver I buy a little bit of
each to make sure that I'm covered no

this is a real possibility on how they
can convince the world into staying with
the central banking system so all I'm
gonna say is be very careful out there
because central bankers they're not
honest they're only in it for themselves
they don't care if you lose all your
wealth because their job is to take your
wealth their job is to steal your
property your assets it's to steal and
Rob countries of their assets and to put

this is their manifesto this is what
they do so we can see that this is a
possibility in what is happening today
and I'm saying be very careful in what
you're doing now again we see that the
entire system is
breaking down and they know that the
dollar is gonna eventually go away they
know that it cannot continue on they
can't sustain it there's just too much

everything is falling apart rapidly and
there are people that say you know they
STR will be on the high level
cryptocurrency will be on the lower

purchase gold and silver to protect your

be in the crypto market make sure you

direction we go in and again they'll
make it very easy for you to take your

the people at some point need to stand

but what they'll do is they'll they just
won't put it out there they're gonna try

right now listen everyone thanks a lot
